description: Visual storytelling reference database for rich, descriptive scene writing

references.name: Rule of Thirds
references.description: Divide frame into 9 equal parts, place key elements along lines or intersections
references.example_description: Subject positioned at right third intersection, background at left third

references.name: Leading Lines
references.description: Use natural or architectural lines to guide viewer's eye to subject
references.example_description: Railway tracks converging toward distant figure, road lines pulling into horizon

references.name: Symmetry & Balance
references.description: Mirror composition or perfect balance between elements
references.example_description: Perfectly centered subject, mirrored reflections in water or glass

references.name: Negative Space
references.description: Use empty space around subject to create emphasis and breathing room
references.example_description: Small subject in corner, vast empty sky or wall surrounding

references.name: Frame Within Frame
references.description: Use natural elements to create secondary frame around subject
references.example_description: View through doorway, window, or archway framing distant subject

references.name: Foreground Interest
references.description: Add elements in foreground to create depth and context
references.example_description: Blurred flowers in foreground, sharp mountain background

references.name: Dutch Angle / Tilted Frame
references.description: Deliberately tilt camera to create dynamic tension
references.example_description: Entire scene tilted 15-30 degrees, horizon at diagonal

references.name: Low Angle Shot
references.description: Camera positioned below subject, looking up
references.example_description: Looking up at skyscraper, subject towering above camera

references.name: High Angle / Bird's Eye
references.description: Camera positioned above subject, looking down
references.example_description: Aerial view of city streets, subject small in vast landscape

references.name: Eye Level
references.description: Camera at natural human eye height
references.example_description: Straightforward view as if viewer standing facing subject

references.name: Golden Hour
references.description: Warm, soft sunlight during first/last hour of sun
references.example_description: Warm orange-gold light, long soft shadows, glowing highlights

references.name: Blue Hour
references.description: Cool twilight before sunrise or after sunset
references.example_description: Deep blue sky, artificial lights starting to glow, soft ambient light

references.name: Harsh Midday Sun
references.description: Strong overhead sunlight creating hard shadows
references.example_description: Sharp dark shadows, bright highlights, high contrast

references.name: Overcast / Diffused
references.description: Soft even lighting from cloudy sky
references.example_description: No harsh shadows, soft gradients, even exposure across scene

references.name: Neon Night
references.description: Artificial neon and LED lights in darkness
references.example_description: Pink, blue, purple neon signs reflecting on wet surfaces, deep shadows

references.name: Chiaroscuro / Dramatic Contrast
references.description: Strong contrast between light and dark areas
references.example_description: Half face in light, half in shadow; bright subject against dark background

references.name: Silhouette / Backlit
references.description: Subject dark against bright background
references.example_description: Subject completely dark against bright sky or light source

references.name: Rim Light / Edge Light
references.description: Light from behind creating glowing outline around subject
references.example_description: Glowing outline around hair and shoulders, subject separated from dark background

references.name: Soft Ambient Indoor
references.description: Gentle indoor lighting from windows or lamps
references.example_description: Soft window light, warm lamp glow, gentle shadows

references.name: Volumetric / Fog & Haze
references.description: Light rays visible through fog, smoke, or haze
references.example_description: Light beams cutting through fog, hazy atmosphere, visible light rays

references.name: Blade Runner / Cyberpunk Noir
references.description: Neon-lit dystopian urban environments with rain and reflections
references.example_description: Rain-soaked streets reflecting neon signs, dark alleys with cyan and magenta lighting, dystopian atmosphere

references.name: Wes Anderson Symmetry
references.description: Perfect symmetry, pastel colors, whimsical production design
references.example_description: Perfectly centered composition, pastel color scheme, symmetrical architecture, whimsical details

references.name: Film Noir
references.description: High contrast black and white with dramatic shadows
references.example_description: Harsh shadows from venetian blinds, silhouetted figures, high contrast lighting, smoky atmosphere

references.name: Terrence Malick Naturalism
references.description: Natural light, golden hour, dreamy nature cinematography
references.example_description: Golden sunlight through wheat fields, natural flowing movement, wide angle landscapes, dreamy atmosphere

references.name: Christopher Nolan Realism
references.description: IMAX scale, practical effects, architectural grandeur
references.example_description: Epic architectural scale, IMAX-worthy composition, cool blue-gray color grading, grounded realism

references.name: Wong Kar-wai Romance
references.description: Saturated colors, motion blur, romantic neon-lit urbanism
references.example_description: Saturated neon colors, romantic motion blur, intimate urban spaces, step-printing aesthetic

references.name: Kubrick Symmetry
references.description: One-point perspective, perfect symmetry, wide angle distortion
references.example_description: Perfect one-point perspective, centered subject, wide angle lens distortion, clinical precision

references.name: Studio Ghibli Fantasy
references.description: Hand-drawn warmth, fantastical nature, gentle color palette
references.example_description: Soft hand-painted sky, fantastical natural elements, gentle color palette, whimsical atmosphere

references.name: David Fincher Dark Precision
references.description: Dark tones, precise composition, green-teal color grading
references.example_description: Dark teal color grading, precise clinical framing, deep shadows, meticulous detail

references.name: Roger Deakins Mastery
references.description: Perfect exposure, natural but enhanced lighting, painterly quality
references.example_description: Perfectly exposed natural light, painterly composition, subtle color gradients, cinematographic perfection

emotional_visual_mood.description: Visual techniques specifically for emotional impact and mood

references.name: Isolation & Loneliness
references.visual_technique: Small subject in vast empty space, cool desaturated colors
references.composition_approach: Subject small and off-center, surrounded by negative space
references.example_description: Tiny figure in vast snowy landscape, desaturated blue tones, empty space surrounding

references.name: Intimacy & Warmth
references.visual_technique: Close framing, warm lighting, soft focus background
references.composition_approach: Tight framing on faces or hands, shallow depth of field
references.lighting_approach: Warm golden or amber, soft shadows
references.example_description: Close-up of faces in warm candlelight, soft focus background, amber glow, intimate proximity

references.name: Tension & Anxiety
references.visual_technique: Claustrophobic framing, harsh shadows, tilted angles
references.composition_approach: Tight uncomfortable framing, dutch angles, blocked exits
references.lighting_approach: Harsh contrast, deep shadows, fluorescent coldness
references.example_description: Claustrophobic tight framing, tilted angle, harsh fluorescent lighting, deep threatening shadows

references.name: Wonder & Awe
references.visual_technique: Epic scale, bright highlights, expansive composition
references.composition_approach: Wide expansive frame, small human vs vast environment
references.lighting_approach: Bright highlights, god rays, volumetric lighting
references.camera_movement: slow reveal, rising crane, expansive pan
references.example_description: Vast mountain landscape, tiny human figure, god rays breaking through clouds, epic scale

references.name: Nostalgia & Memory
references.visual_technique: Soft focus, warm vintage tones, gentle vignetting
references.composition_approach: Centered subjects, gentle framing, classic composition
references.lighting_approach: Soft diffused, warm amber, gentle glow
references.example_description: Soft focus vintage aesthetic, warm sepia tones, gentle vignetting, dreamlike quality

references.name: Power & Dominance
references.visual_technique: Low angle, bold lighting, strong symmetry
references.composition_approach: Low angle looking up, centered symmetry, imposing scale
references.lighting_approach: Dramatic directional, strong shadows, bold contrast
references.example_description: Low angle shot of towering figure, dramatic lighting from below, bold symmetrical composition

references.name: Chaos & Confusion
references.visual_technique: Unstable framing, rapid movement, fragmented composition
references.composition_approach: Broken rule of thirds, multiple focal points, unstable
references.camera_movement: handheld shaky, rapid whip pans, unstable
references.example_description: Shaky handheld camera, multiple light sources clashing, unstable composition, rapid movement

references.name: Serenity & Peace
references.visual_technique: Balanced composition, soft natural light, gentle colors
references.composition_approach: Balanced symmetry or rule of thirds, harmonious
references.example_description: Balanced natural composition, soft diffused morning light, gentle blue-green palette, still calm water

references.name: Mystery & Intrigue
references.visual_technique: Obscured elements, shadows hiding details, partial revelation
references.composition_approach: Partial frames, shadows hiding subject, foreground obstruction
references.lighting_approach: Rim lighting, selective focus, dramatic shadows
references.camera_movement: slow creeping dolly, reveal through darkness
references.example_description: Subject partially hidden in shadow, rim light revealing only silhouette, foreground elements obscuring view

references.name: Joy & Celebration
references.visual_technique: Bright saturated colors, dynamic movement, energetic composition
references.composition_approach: Dynamic diagonals, movement and energy, vibrant subjects
references.example_description: Bright saturated colors, dynamic diagonal composition, energetic movement, celebratory atmosphere

references.name: Melancholy & Sadness
references.visual_technique: Desaturated colors, rain or fog, downward angles
references.composition_approach: Subjects low in frame, looking down, heavy sky
references.lighting_approach: Overcast gray, minimal contrast, soft shadows
references.example_description: Desaturated blue-gray palette, overcast sky, rain on windows, subject low in frame looking down

references.name: Danger & Threat
references.visual_technique: Dark shadows, harsh red accents, unstable framing
references.composition_approach: Trapped framing, shadows encroaching, unstable dutch angle
references.lighting_approach: Harsh side lighting, deep shadows, red warning tones
references.example_description: Deep shadows encroaching on subject, harsh red lighting accents, unstable dutch angle, claustrophobic framing

usage_notes.for_writer_agent: Use these references to write rich, visually detailed scene descriptions. DO NOT write technical prompts - that's the Visual Creator's job. Your role is to describe scenes like a director explaining a shot to their cinematographer.
usage_notes.composition_techniques: Describe camera angle, framing, and subject positioning using these references
usage_notes.lighting_atmosphere: Describe the quality, direction, and mood of light in the scene
usage_notes.cinematic_styles: Reference these styles to quickly communicate a complex visual aesthetic
usage_notes.emotional_visual_mood: Select visual techniques that enhance the emotional intent of the scene
